meanings.definition: A type of clay that swells when mixed with water, commonly used in drilling fluids and as a binder in foundry sands.
meanings.sent1: The workers added bentonite to the drilling fluid to help it flow smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The company purchased a large quantity of bentonite for their construction project.
meanings.sent3: When the bentonite clay started dancing in the water, everyone was amazed.
meanings.sent4: The bentonite acted like a sponge, soaking up all the excess moisture in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The children molded the bentonite into various shapes, enjoying its malleability.

meanings.definition: A substance that is used in various industrial applications for its absorbent and adsorbent properties.
meanings.sent1: The factory used bentonite to absorb the spilled oil on the floor.
meanings.sent2: Bentonite is a key ingredient in many beauty products due to its absorbent nature.
meanings.sent3: The bentonite powder played hide-and-seek with the spilled liquids in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like bentonite, absorbing every detail of the lecture.
meanings.sent5: The bentonite granules quickly soaked up the water, leaving the surface dry.
